title: Bug 17894: 'Open Mode' preference not reset by 'Restore Defaults'
description: When using the 'Restore Defaults' option in the settings, the 'Open Mode' preference remains unchanged.
OB: The 'Open Mode' preference persists even after selecting 'Restore Defaults' in the settings.
EB: The 'Open Mode' preference should reset to its default value after choosing 'Restore Defaults' in the settings.
SR:
1. Open the application/settings menu.
2. Navigate to the 'Preferences' or 'Settings' section.
3. Locate the 'Open Mode' setting.
4. Change the 'Open Mode' setting to a non-default value.
5. Select the 'Restore Defaults' option.
6. Check if the 'Open Mode' preference reverts to its default setting.
